LanguageData.HadFeastParty1.stages.0.label: Drop by feast party
LanguageData.HadFeastParty1.stages.0.description: I just drop by a feast party. It looked like it was fun!
LanguageData.HadFeastParty2.stages.0.label: Took part in feast party
LanguageData.HadFeastParty2.stages.0.description: I was at an enjoying feast party. I should have stayed longer!
LanguageData.HadFeastParty3.stages.0.label: Had a good feast party
LanguageData.HadFeastParty3.stages.0.description: I had a good feast party. It was a nice to chat and revel with all my people!
LanguageData.HadFeastParty4.stages.0.label: Had a great feast party
LanguageData.HadFeastParty4.stages.0.description: I had a great feast party. It was such a pleasant time in this harsh world. I look forward to the next one!
LanguageData.HadFeastPartyPsychopaths.stages.0.label: Was at feast party
LanguageData.HadFeastPartyPsychopaths.stages.0.descri: Look at those guys wiggling and getting drunk. Is it what you call a 'party'? It is both so absurd and hilarious!
